name: hypsometric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to hypsometry (= the science of measuring the high and low areas of the Earth's surface): A clear indication that there is no global system of plate tectonics on Venus is its hypsometric distribution. A hypsometric curve shows the elevations of the regions lying between the continental platforms and the ocean basins. Related word
hypsometry
More examplesFewer examplesA comparison of hypsometric curves for Earth, Venus, and Mars shows that only one percent of the surface area is found at an elevation above five kilometres.
